channel.title: DevGroups
channel.description: A huge list of developer groups around the world

item.title: DevGroup: Node.js Denver/Boulder
item.description: A Meetup group for anyone who is currently using or interested in knowing more about Node.js.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: DevGroup: Node.js Club SF
item.description: This meetup is focused on spreading knowledge and best practices for the use of Node.js. Node is exploding with a massive and dedicated developer community, and is moving into enterprise stacks.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: DevGroup: Node.js Paris
item.description: We are a group of enthusiastic developers specializing in Javascript and specifically with Node.js from Paris.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: DevGroup: Chicago Node.js
item.description: A group to discuss Node.js, its frameworks, and best practices.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: DevGroup: Toronto JavaScript
item.description: Toronto JavaScript is a meet up for those interested in all things JavaScript. Client side, server side, we love it all!
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: DevGroup: The SF JavaScript Meetup
item.description: Hang out and discuss JavaScript tips, tricks, hacks, and frameworks with some of the best scripters around. Show off cool stuff you've done and learn about what else is going on in the JS community.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: DevGroup: AngularJS Paris Meetup
item.description: If you love AngularJS and live in or around Paris, join us!
